channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Domain-Driven Design (DDD) Demystified】域驱动设计（DDD）脱神秘
item.description: 【Most software doesn’t break because of syntax errors or flawed if-else logic.】大多数软件不会因为语法错误而破坏或存在缺陷，如果else逻辑有缺陷。

item.title: 【How DoorDash’s In-House Search Engine Achieved a 50% Drop in Latency】Doordash的内部搜索引擎如何达到50％的潜伏期
item.description: 【🚀Faster mobile releases with automated QA (Sponsored)】＆＃128640;使用自动质量检查（赞助）更快的移动版本

item.title: 【How Halo on Xbox Scaled to 10+ Million Players using the Saga Pattern】Xbox上的光环如何使用SAGA图案缩放到100多百万球员
item.description: 【One powerful pattern for solving this problem is the Saga Pattern, a technique originally proposed in the late 1980s but increasingly relevant today.】解决此问题的一种强大模式是传奇模式，这是一种最初提出的技术，最初是在1980年代后期提出的，但今天越来越重要。

item.title: 【Synchronous vs Asynchronous Communication: When to Use What?】同步与异步通信：何时使用什么？
item.description: 【At some point, every system has to make a call: Should this interaction happen synchronously or asynchronously?】在某个时候，每个系统都必须呼叫：这种交互是否应该同步或异步发生？

item.title: 【How WhatsApp Handles 40 Billion Messages Per Day】WhatsApp每天如何处理400亿条消息
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll take a technical dive into how WhatsApp built its architecture and the challenges the engineering team faced during this journey.】在本文中，我们将研究WhatsApp如何构建其架构以及工程团队在此旅程中面临的挑战。

item.title: 【How Canva Collects 25 Billion Events a Day】帆布如何每天收集250亿个活动
item.description: 【This article walks through how Canva structures, collects, and distributes billions of events daily, without drowning in tech debt and increasing cloud bills.】本文介绍了每天如何收集和分发数十亿个事件，而不会淹没技术债务并增加云账单。

item.title: 【How Airbnb Powers Personalization With 1M Events Per Second】Airbnb如何使用每秒100万事件为个性化提供个性化功能
item.description: 【Personalizing an experience meaningfully, especially across a product as broad as Airbnb, requires understanding users while they interact with the app.】有意义地对体验进行个性化，尤其是在像Airbnb一样广泛的产品中，需要在用户与应用程序互动时了解。

item.title: 【How Meta Built Threads to Support 100 Million Signups in 5 Days】元如何在5天内建立线程以支持1亿个注册
item.description: 【When a new app hits 100 million signups in under a week, the instinct is to assume someone built a miracle backend overnight.】当一个新应用在一周不到一周的时间内登陆1亿个注册时，本能是假设有人在一夜之间建立了一个奇迹的后端。

item.title: 【EP161: A Cheatsheet on REST API Design Best Practices】EP161：关于REST API设计最佳实践的备忘单
item.description: 【Well-designed APIs behave consistently, fair predictably, and grow without friction.】精心设计的API的行为始终如一，可以预见，并且没有摩擦。

item.title: 【EP160: Top 20 System Design Concepts You Should Know】EP160：您应该知道的前20个系统设计概念
item.description: 【Load Balancing: Distributes traffic across multiple servers for reliability and availability.】负载平衡：在多个服务器上分配流量以获得可靠性和可用性。
